attributes.action: Make PCR tests free for travel abroad
attributes.additional_details: Make PCR tests free everywhere.like the flow tests and make them freely available to everyone who needs them for free.
attributes.background: I want the government to make all PCR tests for travel abroad and returning from abroad free of charge. It is crippling millions of people paying extortionate fees for them before and after travelling meaning many people cannot afford holidays or specially to see their families etc.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Provide free PCR tests for international travel and return to the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590483
